title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Constructivist-Based Language Learning Projects for Multicultural Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can utilize practical language strategies for effective communication with individuals from diverse cultural backgrounds with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can present three or more behavioral indicators to assess attitudes that respect cultural differences through situational role-playing and project outcomes.
Learners complete 100% of collaborative documents/multimedia content related to multicultural team projects using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
